testcase.name: Identify repeated words from translated titles
testcase.system-out: Given I visit the website "https://elpais.com"..............................passed Then I am on the "EL PAÍS: el periódico global" homepage....................passed Given I navigate to the "opinion" section of the website....................passed When I fetch the first 5 articles titles....................................passed Then I translate the article titles to "English"............................passed And I have the translated headers...........................................passed When I identify words repeated more than 2 times across all headers.........passed Then I print each repeated word with its count of occurrences...............passed
